heroSection.heading1: Take back office to next level
heroSection.heading2: boNeeds is the backbone of any business, playing an integral role in a businessâ€™ ability to operate, grow & develop.
heroSection.heading3: Let you focus on your business than managing vendors, users, projects, invoice manually.

featuresSection.title: Detailed Reporting
featuresSection.description: Place to get all the detailed reporting about revenue, profit, performance by account, vendor, project and by resource.

featuresSection.title: Manage Vendors
featuresSection.description: Know when and how your projects are going so you can stay on top of all the dates and its revenue.

featuresSection.title: Manage projects
featuresSection.description: You don't have to hunt your email inbox to find that one conversation. Every task, project, and vendor information is just a click away.

featuresSection.title: Manage invoices
featuresSection.description: You don't have to deal with multiple portals or paper traces to manage invoices and payment, can do everything in one place without going out of page.

featuresSection.title: Time and Expense entry
featuresSection.description: Manage your and your team time and expenses, Enable workflow to approve your expenses and track the payments.
